snippet: Observers from the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe have been monitoring U.S. elections for a decade. This year, however, conservatives have expressed concern about the presence of watchdogs from the old Continent.
abstract: Observers from the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe have been monitoring U.S. elections for a decade. This year, however, conservatives have expressed concern about the presence of watchdogs from the old Continent.

headline.main: Republican Angst Over European Election Monitors

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
